divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up around 2:30 AM, restless, and got up out of bed, and just gazed pointlessly out of the two-story bedroom window which faced the south. As I loved to watch the stars, etc. Then it caught my eye. About twenty odd miles away to the south, was a reddish-orange dully glowing football like apparition about 500' off the ground. I could also observe occasional pulsations, and also that it seemed to have several accompanying smaller white discs. So, I assumed that I was probably watching a UFO mothership, or a reasonable facsimile of one, and of it's smaller companions. The reason I suspected it right off to be a UFO mother-ship, is that two of my bosses' sons were attendign a UFO festival up there at a ranch that I want to recall as Buffalo Ranch. However the name could be wrong. As the two boys told me the group intended to "call in" a UFO or two, I declined to go, as for one, we all had to work the next day in our very hard jobs. I did not fancy it worth the trip, and it actually sorta creeped me out. The next day the two young men told me that there were approximately a thousand people there in attendance. And yes, we discussed the UFOs, that they had "called in". They were very proud of themselves, but something seemed just a little on the occult or spooky side, so I never pursued the matter, or went to one of their events, though I was a believer in UFOs.
Summary: I viewed a UFO manifestation from a long way off.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Puyallup
There were no other sightings in Puyallup on or around June 28th 1971
